do: Ensure contrast ≥ 4.5:1 for normal text and ≥ 3:1 for large text (≈ 18pt regular / 14pt bold).
Check text over images/gradients; add an overlay or change colors to meet thresholds.
Include images of text in checks (logos are exempt).
dont: Don’t use very light placeholder/help text that falls below thresholds.
Don’t rely on user zoom or bolding to pass contrast.
Don’t put important text over busy imagery without sufficient overlay.
edge_cases: Large-scale text qualifies for 3:1; verify actual computed size/weight.
Semi-transparent overlays and gradients can change effective contrast.
Disabled controls are out-of-scope for 1.4.3 (but consider 1.4.11 for non-text contrast separately).
Logotypes/images of text that are logos are exempt.
